formalText: Her parents are coming to visit this weekend and she is a bit nervous about it
Talked about how her mother is doing poorly in regulating her hypothyroidism and has not been taking her medications correctly

Patient feels better this week than I have for the last couple of weeks so she is at loss of words to talk. We are going to make this session about working from session to session with weekly issues. This week was her mother's hypothyroidism and her marriage with Tony
She certainly feels more free than she did maybe two months ago in her marriage, but clearly not fully free because she doesn't feel she can express herself when she feels angry
Her mother has hypothyroidism and one of the major symptoms of hypothyroidism is increased anxiety and one of the major symptoms of hypothyroidism is tiredness and depression for a while.
